extension.title: Bangla Date
extension.description: This extension adds a Bangla Date (Bongabdo) to the forum forum head. e.g (আজ ২৭ চৈত্র ১৪১৫ বাংলা)
extension.author: Tareq Hasan (http://tareq.wedevs.com)

hooks.hook: $forum_head['bangla_date'] = '<style type="text/css"> #brd-bnDate { font-size: 14px; padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; padding-right: 20px; float: right; margin-top: -25px;} </style>';
